summary: A mod which allows the dragonborn to have a time out, and take a few dives off this, super safe diving platform. Water not included.
descriptionHtml:
[center][u]Bugs that i have picked up on:[/u]

-For some reason i named the kid, "Dead King" rather than "Kid". [i]Not very important so i won't fix it.[/i]

[s]-Platform a bit glitchy when jumping, causing the player to die. [/s]   [i] I managed to fix this, so its all good.[/i]

-Follower will not follow when jumping    [i]I already knew this from the beginning, not really essential so i'm not going to fix it. [/i]
